definition: to avoid suffering/to avoid meeting (a fatal accident)/spared
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
to meet by chance (usually with misfortune)/classifier for events: time, turn, incident

sentences.english: The brave mother defended her son from the mad dog.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢的母亲保护了她的儿子，使他免遭疯狗之殃。

sentences.english: What’s a good way to improve it?
sentences.chinese: 有什么好的办法可以免遭恶报吗？

sentences.english: It allowed you to protect your helpless offspring from sabre-toothed tigers.
sentences.chinese: 它让你保护你那些无助的后代免遭剑齿虎的伤害。

sentences.english: Bulldogs were also used for protection against other carnivorous wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 斗牛狗也用于保护人们免遭其他食肉动物的伤害。

sentences.english: I rescued my belongings from the flood.
sentences.chinese: 我把财物抢救出来，免遭洪水淹没。

sentences.english: The new card will safeguard the company against fraud.
sentences.chinese: 新卡将保护公司免遭诈骗。

sentences.english: This gas mask can immunize you against poison gas.
sentences.chinese: 防毒面具能使你免遭毒气袭击。

sentences.english: Network Shield - Provider SettingsNetwork Shield provider protects your computer from Internet worm attacks.
sentences.chinese: 网络防护保护您的计算机免遭网络蠕虫的侵袭。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the Great Wall fortified China against barbarian invasions.
sentences.chinese: 古时候，长城保卫着中国，使之免遭蛮夷的入侵。

sentences.english: It also includes immunity from prosecution for Saleh and his family.
sentences.chinese: 它还包括萨利赫和他的家人免遭起诉的内容。

sentences.english: The Qur'an was able to hold the Arabic language in thrall from the moment it was revealed.
sentences.chinese: 古兰从被降示那一刻起便能保护阿拉伯语免遭奴役。
但没有哪个国家免遭结核的困扰。

sentences.english: But perhaps these cultural boundaries exist to prevent Israelites from abominations?
sentences.chinese: 但也许这些文化壁垒的存在保护了以色列人免遭憎恶？

sentences.english: Without spores, Candida can better avoid getting busted.
sentences.chinese: 没有孢子，假丝酵母便能更好地免遭破坏。

sentences.english: The “Elephant Pump” has a concrete casing protecting water from contamination.
sentences.chinese: 这种“象式水泵”用混凝土做围挡，可使水免遭污染。

sentences.english: The dead plankton on the bottom must be preserved from oxidation.
sentences.chinese: 在海底的浮游生物必须被保护起来以免遭氧化作用。

definition: to avoid suffering/to prevent (sth bad)/to protect against (damage)/immunity (from prosecution)/freedom (from pain, damage etc)/exempt from punishment
to be saved from/to be spared (something)
to save from damage/to preserve/to maintain/to keep in good repair/(Tw) security guard
violent death (idiom); to die in a disaster/an unnatural death
refuge/to take refuge/to seek asylum (political etc)
to meet with disaster/to die tragically
